name: Danganronpa Fanfic (DanganFanfic) v2 - New World Order Prologue (Character Intros)
name_original: Danganronpa Fanfic (DanganFanfic) v2 - New World Order Prologue (Character Intros)
description:
- Originally (still) made to be a bit of harmless fun, with my friends as the target audience 

- Completely non-commercial. But if you want, you can pay me with constructive comments (and showing interest in the casting call) :3

- Filled to the brim with inside jokes/random gaming/anime/pop/etc. references. 

- The prologue release is mainly to test the waters and see if a non-involved audience will find this playable despite the aforementioned writing quirks. Also, seeing if we can make a dent through the fact that this is actually a playable game rather than just a web series (apparently the whole 'playable game' thing is a selling point). 

- The characters are intended to be relatively unique, but still sorta fit in to the Danganronpa universe as characters in their own right. They're also supposed to reference my friends through obscure, hyper-exaggerated character qualities/quotes. These qualities were exaggerated to the extent that most of them didn't recognise their own characters (true story). 

The following is intended to credit content creators for work I have used which is NOT MY OWN:

  • Chi from Seichizu for being (and continuing to be) a WONDERFUL sprite artist. And of course, for putting up with me. I have nothing but praise for the incredible work she has put in.
  • Blow off Candle (HD Video Collection, used in the OP)
  • Fast Ticking Clock (Eden Goring, used in the OP)
  • Team Alpha (hey looks it's us! Intro cards for all characters, in snazzy Danganronpa v3 style? Say no more!)
  • LCat4Ever (compilation of Danganronpa backgrounds)
  • SheWolf294 (Graveyard, used in the first scene)
  • The creators of the Danganronpa Rebirth OP: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H-QWn-Nyxu0 (concept and audio used for the OP)
  • Spike Chunsoft (for all the Monokuma sprites + the Danganronpa music that I used, including):
  • -Beautiful Lie (main daily life theme, from DR v3)
  • -Becoming Friends (Free Time Event theme, from DR v3)
  • -Cool Morning (secondary daily life theme, DR v3)
  • -Mr Monokuma’s Class (Monokuma’s Theme, DR v3)
  • -Nightmare in the Locker (DR v3)
  • -Living in a Lazy Parallel World (DR v3)
  • -Real Fiction (Prologue Theme, DR v3)
  • -Rise of the Ultimates (DR v3)
  • -Heaps of assorted sound effects (mainly DR2)
  • Capcom (for all the Phoenix Wright music that was used as character themes, including):
  • -Elise Deauxnim (Simple Melody, Trials and Tribulations – used as Eden’s theme)
  • -Justine Courtney (Goddess of Law – Ace Attorney Investigations 2 – used as Levitica’s theme)
  • -Kay Faraday (Reminiscence: The Girl’s Lost Memories – Ace Attorney Investigations 2 – used as Mii-Yu’s theme)
  • -Dahlia Hawthorne (Distant Trace – Trials and Tribulations – used as Mona’s theme)
  • Britain
  • -‘Rule Brittania’, which was used [totes inappropriately but W/E] as Hunt’s theme
